thread.title: UK factory output falls for first time in almost a year

title: UK factory output falls for first time in almost a year
text:
UK factory output falls for first time in almost a year   01:27 
British manufacturing output fell unexpectedly in February, its first month-on-month drop in almost a year, adding to signs the economy may have slowed in the first quarter. Silvia Antonioli reports
